```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
anscombe
```
```{r}
ansc <-
  bind_cols(
    anscombe %>%
      select(matches("x")) %>%
      gather(dataset, "x"),
    anscombe %>%
      select(matches("y")) %>%
      gather(key, "y")
  ) %>%
  select(-key) %>%
  mutate(dataset = gsub("x", "", dataset)) %>%
  as_tibble()
    
```
